messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8c13fd11d20d ***

test: use testlib (another bunch).

Apply sed with:

1s,^// $G $D/$F.go && $L $F.$A && ./$A.out || echo.*,// run,
1s,^// $G $D/$F.go || echo.*,// compile,

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5656099

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5656099: test: use testlib (another bunch).
